Hours

Lobby entrance: The front lobby of Building 51 and the rear lobby of Building 50 are both open 4:30 a.m. to 8:30 p.m. 
General visiting: 8:30 a.m. to 8:30 p.m. Exceptions are listed below.

Community living center

We offer flexible visiting hours and encourage you to discuss special circumstances like parties or overnight stays with your care team in advance.

Visitor policies

We look forward to meeting your family and loved ones. Here are a few helpful tips to make their next visit go smoothly:

  • Guests can purchase meals to enjoy with patients when they visit. Please give your care team at least two days’ advance notice. You or your guest must pay the Agent Cashier in advance. Specify how many extra meals you need and when you would like them served.

  • Guests who bring their own meals will have access to silverware and a microwave, if needed.

  • Family members or loved ones who are sick should postpone their visit.

  • Please use proper hand hygiene. Use hand sanitizer when available and wash hands as appropriate throughout the visit.

See VA Pittsburgh's full visitation policy
